comment: This class was a maymester, literally the easiest A I've ever received. I spent 4 hours total on the class and got a 97. most of the assignments were "what was your favorite part of this piece and why?" and a few definitions and concepts to understand

Professor Mann is awesome. I took her online maymester course and it was probably the easiest class I've ever taken. Just do the assignments and you are almost guaranteed an A. Very easy to reach over email as well and provides interesting feedback on every assignment. I actually enjoyed this class too.

Dr. Mann is an amazing director and makes choir so fun. The class is easy and so fun. As long as you show up to class, participate, and participate in concerts you will pass the class. If you are having any issues, make sure you communicate that to her, and she will work with you.
Easiest class Ive ever taken. If you dont get an A in this, its really your fault tbh.

This was the easiest class I have ever taken. I took it online asynchronous and I probably had 1 hour of work for the whole week. You literally just do like 5 mini quizzes based on chapters in the textbook, but you just keep going until you get a 100 or the grade you want. Tests are easy too and on lockdown browser but no camera. Take this class!!

A great professor that wants you to do well! I took as a Maymester course, was able to work on course work at my own pace, and finished the class before the two weeks was even up. I would definitely recommend if youre looking to get a core requirement out of the way.

This was my first in-class experience in over 25 years, and Dr. Mann really set the bar high for the rest. She made every lecture interesting and is funny and relatable. I thoroughly enjoyed her summer class. She wants her students to do well and is very helpful before tests and quizzes. I highly recommend her!
Dr. Mann is a very nice professor. Do the lecture notes and you should be fine. She even gives very helpful test reviews. She is approachable if you ever need to discuss the course with her.
Easy A, just go to class.

Dr. Mann was a fantastic professor. I can't recommend her enough. I had no music background before taking this class but I loved it. She made it extremely enjoyable. Three tests and have to attend two concerts. Easy A.

Took her 8-week summer class. Easy A as long as you use her test study guides she provides and pay attention in class. Had to attend 2 concerts and do 1-2 paragraphs for each. You need the book, but the readings are short and easy, as are the assignments that go with them. She's nice and makes lectures fun. Take her for 1107 if you want an easy A!

Dr. Mann will brighten your day! She really enjoys what she does and cares for the happiness and success of her students. She is always willing to talk with you and responds to anything quickly! She is also an incredible advisor.

Great energy, dorky soul, good person. Class is kind of boring if you're not musical (I am but not a music major so I vacillated between bored and enthused.) Lectures are straight forward, I never touched the book after renting it, class is good even on a dull day. Like I said, you may not give a crap about the subject but she makes it fun.

Dr. Mann is a good teacher, she makes things clear, and she is an easy grader. I don't like her as a person (she is close-minded), but she was a fine teacher. She lectures the whole time, but the power points are easy to follow and she usually puts them on D2L. She makes it clear what will tested. Passing is easy if you study what she tells you.

Dr. Mann is my favorite professor I've ever had. I love her so much. She's incredibly talented, smart, beautiful. I'm taking women's chorus in the fall just so I can have a class with her again. She's incredible. Take her.

I took University Chorale, which is basically attendance and concert participation. Easy A if you show up and sing with a smile.  Dr. Mann was hilarious, always making jokes and being a goofball, but she's very nice and passionate about the music. Always there to talk nerdy about composers and other university choirs.

Dr. Mann is the best. She is so funny and very easy going. You can tell she really loves her job as a teacher and she inspires a lot of her students. She focuses on the material too and being open and participating in class totally matters. You must attend the concerts and such but that really isn't a big deal. love her!
Great teacher!  Take her for your required music class.  She is very energetic and lectures are actually better than you would think for a music class.

Professor Mann makes this an easy, fun class, even during the summer. Just do the assignments and study for the tests and quizzes. She drops the lowest quiz grade. The book is necessary for assignments. There are 4 tests, and she does a review. Also, if you're having trouble, she'll be glad to help you out. She wants you to make an A.
Dr. Mann is my FAVORITE! She loves her job and really cares about her students. She has really helped me improve vocally, and she is all about having a good time! TAKE WOMENS CHOIR!
SHE IS LITERALLY MY FAVORITE! She makes music so fun! She cares about her students and you can tell she loves her job. I cant stop signing up for Womens Ensemble because of her.

Extremely easy. Quizzes are always "name 2 things from readings." Make sure you do the readings. Tests are straight from her study guides, no note-taking, posts power points online. Final is an easy group project. Teacher is disorganized, late for class almost every day, post-pones class often, and mis-grades every single test. Easy  A

Dr. Mann is the BEST teacher ever. If you can, take her. She is SO helpful. The assignments are actually relevant to the class and worth your time- no busywork. She loves teaching and is very dedicated. This was my favorite class of the semester, because of her.
Dr. Mann is a delightful teacher and makes this class lots of fun.  She knows her stuff and does a very good review before each test. If you want music to be fun, take this class!
I felt like a Rhodes Scholar in this class.  She is hilarious, and an easy A.

Really nice lady and awesome teacher. She knows her stuff, so I give her kudos. I did think it was a little bit ridiculous to have read every class and 90% of the time there would be a pop quiz... Overall learned a lot. I would suggest her

Mann is great. She knows alot about music but she does her best to make it interesting. She also young and really funny. Easy A just come to class. She has reviews before the test which tell you everything you need to know.
She is amazing...she knows alot about music and is out to help anyone that she can. This is the best professor ever. :-)

Dr. Mann is one of the  best professors I have  ever  had! She is so  bubbly and  very   funny. I had her  for an 8 am summer  class  and i was  up  the whole time  because she  would crack  jokes and keep us engaged.  She  is  a sweetheart, and  tries to get to know everyone in a class of like 100! I would  definitely take  her again if  i was not

She is an AWESOME teacher!  She made the class fun and worth going too!  She will make you laugh a lot.  She does check attendance and reading the book is needed for the test.  She is also very understanding when it comes to something happening in your personal life and working with you and not just brushing you off like a lot of teachers.

I've had her for Women's Ensemble since Fall 2008, and I love her so much! She's full of energy and makes the class so much fun. She cares about your performance but won't belittle you to make you work harder. She throws parties for us occasionally and is truly one of the most awesome teachers I've evr had!SIGN UP FOR WOMEN'S ENSEMBLE! :)

Dr. Mann is an excellent teacher!  She expects a lot out of her students, is a stickler on attendance, and encourages a lot of class participation.  She uses the text book.  She has a bubbly personality.  She's really funny!!  You won't be bored in her class.  As long as you show up and put forth some effort you'll do well in her class.
